original_title: Peanuts Deluxe Edition: Touchdown Charlie Brown!
overview: Take to the field as Peanuts score another all-new collection of hits. It’s the big homecoming game and Charlie Brown is in the spotlight as team kicker. If that wasn’t enough, he is also an escort for the homecoming queen and her court. But when Charlie Brown finds out the homecoming queen is none other than the Little Red-Haired Girl, can he overcome his anxiety and fulfill the tradition of giving the queen a kiss on the cheek before the first dance? Good grief, find out in It’s Your First Kiss, Charlie Brown. Then, the laughs march up field with 3 episodes from The Charlie Brown and Snoopy Show. In Woodstock, Woodstock is not impressed when Snoopy's basketball lands in his new nest. Straws finds Charlie Brown and Lucy having a discussion over a glass of lemonade but it’s Snoopy who is sneaking all the sips. While Football has us wondering if Charlie Brown is falling for it again when Lucy tees up the ol’ pigskin.
title: Peanuts Deluxe Edition: Touchdown Charlie Brown!
